EmailTemplate.name: Unconditional Waiting List 2013 Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Your place with The Challenge is confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Challenge Network
You have been placed on a waiting list
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} and Parent/Guardian of {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for completing {!Contact.FirstName}'s application for a place on The Challenge.
Due to the popularity of the programme, {!Contact.FirstName} has temporarily been placed on a waiting list. However, we closely track all allocations across the country and will endeavour to give {!Contact.FirstName} a place on {!Contact.FirstName}'s preferred dates as soon as possible.
We will be in touch with you as soon as there is any progress in {!Contact.FirstName}â€™s application. At this point in time we are not certain when a place will become available, but we are confident we will be able to offer {!Contact.FirstName} a place on the programme. In the unlikely situation that we are not able to offer {!Contact.FirstName} a place, and provided that they have not previously given up a place we have offered, we will of course issue you a full refund.
We are excited that {!Contact.FirstName} has decided to take up this fantastic opportunity, and we will do our very best to ensure we can confirm {!Contact.FirstName}'s place as soon as possible.
If you have any questions, please do get in touch. You can call us on 020 7921 4404, or email us at contact@the-challenge.org. As places are filling up very rapidly across the country, we would urge {!Contact.FirstName} to remind friends to take part in this exciting and unique opportunity.
Yours sincerely,
Rebecca Carter
Director at The Challenge Network
